biotools.summary: Web-based platform to perform survival analysis, particularly, to support identifying molecular signatures significantly associated with cancer patients’ outcome. It provides various analysis methods to discover genes or any other molecules associated with survival of cancer patients.

bioschemas.name: APPEX
